table.Name: wcms_Post
table.Title: #Bài viết theo template

field.Name: Search
field.Property: SqlSP='SP_A_R_001_Tree_PagePost50' Active='true' IsHeader='true' EnableHeader='false' FilterName='Post_PageID' ExpandDepth='3' CheckUserData='true'

field.Name: PostPageList
field.Property: SqlSP='SP_A_R_001_Tree_PagePost50' Active='true' IsHeader='true' EnableHeader='false' Format='{1}' Seperator=';' Height='550px' CheckUserData='true'

table.SQL_LOAD_EDIT:
set nocount on declare @pageList nvarchar(max) set @pageList = '' select @pageList = @pageList + ';' + convert(nvarchar(10), PagePost_PageID) from wcms_PagePost where PagePost_PostID = @editID if (@pageList <> '') set @pageList = substring(@pageList, 2, len(@pageList) - 1)
select [Post_ID] ,[Post_Title] ,[Post_O] ,[Post_A] ,[Post_Brief] ,[Post_Description] ,[Post_Date] ,[Post_PostedBy] ,[Post_Authors] ,[Post_Tags] ,[Post_Viewed] ,[Post_Hot] ,[Post_MetaTitle] ,[Post_MetaKeywords] ,[Post_MetaDescription] ,@pageList as [PostPageList] ,'' as [Post_TitleUrl] ,[Post_File] ,'' as [Post_FullText] ,[Post_Source] ,[Post_DisplayType] ,Post_HeaderLight ,Post_C1 ,Post_C2 ,Post_C3 ,Post_C4 ,Post_C5 ,Post_C6 ,Post_C7 from WCMS_Post where Post_ID = @editID
table.SQL_UPDATE_ACTIVE: Update WCMS_Post set [Post_A] = @active where Post_ID = @editID Select @editID
table.SQL_DELETE:
set nocount on declare @id int set @id = @delID
Delete wcms_PostAuthor where PostAuthor_PostID = @id Delete wcms_PostKeyword where PostKeyword_PostID = @id Delete wcms_PagePost where PagePost_PostID = @id Delete wcms_Comment where Comment_ItemID = @id set nocount off
Delete WCMS_Post where Post_ID = @id Select @@ROWCOUNT
if (@logAcc > 0) Insert into wcms_Log(Log_DateTime, Log_Action, Log_Do, Log_Table, Log_ItemID, Log_AccountID) values(getutcdate(), 'log_post_delete', '(' + @logIP + ') Deleted 1 article.', 'Post - Article', @id, @logAcc)
